directions: Combine cooked rice, raisins, maple syrup, soy milk, almonds, cinnamon and cardamom. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
Immediately reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring frequently to prevent scorching, until thickened, about 5 to 8 minutes. Spoon into bowls and serve.
title: Rice and Raisin Breakfast Pudding
